subject: AI
title: Meta-Prompting
description: Use the model to write and improve its own prompts.

hook.text: You're stuck on a prompt that doesn't quite work. What if you asked the model: 'Rewrite this prompt to be clearer and more effective'?

buildup.text: Meta-prompting uses the model itself as a prompt optimizer. Give it your draft prompt, describe what's going wrong, and ask for an improved version.

discovery.text: 'My prompt gets verbose answers. Rewrite it to enforce concise bullet points with max 15 words each.' The model adds constraints you didn't think of.

twist.text: The model can over-engineer prompts too ‚Äî adding so many constraints that they conflict. Always test the improved prompt on real inputs before trusting it.

climax.text: Meta-prompting is most useful for brainstorming improvements. Generate options, pick the best, test it, iterate. Don't blindly accept the first rewrite.

punchline.text: The best prompt engineer might already be in your chat window.

quiz.question: What is meta-prompting?
options: Prompting a model about prompting techniques
Using the model to improve or generate prompts
